sn6.12:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
sn6.12:1.3: Atha kho brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam gijjhakutam pabbatam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
sn6.12:1.4: Ekamantam thito kho brahma sahampati devadattam arabbha bhagavato santike imam gatham abhasi:
